title: World Leaders Meet to Help Ukraine Stay Safe
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron is having a big meeting in Paris with Ukraine's leader Volodymyr Zelensky and leaders from over 30 countries. They are trying to make a plan to keep Ukraine safe if there is a peace deal with Russia. Russia invaded Ukraine in 2022 and still controls parts of it. The leaders want to agree on security guarantees, which are promises to protect Ukraine if Russia attacks again. They also talk about helping Ukraine's army and economy. This meeting is important because Ukraine needs support from other countries to feel secure. The talks happen while there are other world events, like actions in Venezuela, but the focus is on helping Ukraine.

keywords.explanation: promises from other countries to protect Ukraine if it is attacked
an agreement to stop fighting and make peace
when one country's army enters another country to take control
important people like presidents who make decisions for their countries
the city in France where the meeting is happening

questions.question: Who is hosting the meeting to help Ukraine?
What are the leaders trying to agree on for Ukraine?
Where is the meeting taking place?
What do security guarantees promise to do?
How many countries are part of the meeting?

background_read: Ukraine is a country in Europe that has been fighting with Russia since 2022. Russia took control of some parts of Ukraine, and many countries want to help Ukraine stay safe. Leaders from around the world meet to make plans and promises to support Ukraine, especially if there is a peace deal to stop the fighting. This helps Ukraine feel stronger and protected.
Article_Structure: WHO: French President Emmanuel Macron, Ukraine's leader Volodymyr Zelensky, and leaders from over 30 countries
WHAT: A meeting to agree on security guarantees for Ukraine to keep it safe after a peace deal
WHY: To support Ukraine and make promises to protect it if Russia attacks again

perspectives.description: Many countries want to help Ukraine feel secure and protected from future attacks.
